Spaghetti Carbonara.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Mix yolks with cheese. Fry guanciale. Combine all with pepper.

Margherita Pizza.instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and basil. Bake in preheated oven.

Classic Chili.instructions: Cook beef and onion. Add beans, sauce, and chili powder. Simmer for 1 hour.

Beef Stroganoff.instructions: Sauté beef and onion. Add mushrooms. Stir in sour cream and mustard. Serve over noodles.

Chicken Tikka Masala.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill. Simmer in tomato cream sauce.

Falafel.instructions: Blend ingredients. Form balls. Fry until golden.

Vegetable Stir Fry.instructions: Sauté vegetables and tofu. Add soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.

Fish Tacos.instructions: Grill fish. Assemble tacos with slaw, lime, and avocado.

Pumpkin Soup.instructions: Cook pumpkin and onion. Blend with broth. Simmer. Add cream and nutmeg.

Mushroom Risotto.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onion. Add rice. Gradually stir in broth. Mix in cheese.

Lemon Chicken.instructions: Sauté chicken with garlic. Add lemon juice and butter. Garnish with parsley.

Tomato Bruschetta.instructions: Mix tomato with basil, garlic, and oil. Spoon onto toasted baguette slices.

Apple Pie.instructions: Fill pie crust with apples mixed with sugar, butter, and cinnamon. Bake.

Caesar Salad.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.

Pancakes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour batter on hot griddle. Flip when bubbles form.

Ratatouille.instructions: Layer sliced vegetables in a dish. Bake with herbs and sauce.

Tiramisu.instructions: Layer espresso-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone. Dust with cocoa.

Quiche Lorraine.instructions: Fill pastry shell with bacon and cheese. Mix eggs with cream, pour over. Bake.

Sushi Rolls.instructions: Spread rice on nori. Add salmon, cucumber, and avocado. Roll tightly.
